title: Congress set to begin Rajasthan repair work, Kharge to meet Gehlot and Pilot today
selftext: What should be the solution according to you?
comments: No solution to this unless Pilot backs out like DK Shi. Gehlot has the numbers in Rajastan but Pilot works harder than anyone else there. But Gehlot will never play second fiddle to Pilot and Congress can't take him to the centre because they have nothing to offer there.

Would be a surprise if pilot goes back to what he already head after so much drama

>Congress can't take him to the centre because they have nothing to offer there.

Then take pilot? But there was an report that he was offered but refused

> Then take pilot? But there was an report that he was offered but refused

Take Pilot where?
Buddy, what will they offer Pilot in the centre? Do you know BJP is in power from the last 9 years?
Pretty much. They tried to change the situation by offering Gehlot Party President position. But he has been CM for 15 years. For 30 years he has been Leader of RJ Congress. Why will he give that up?
